The notification appears when a user is near a sight with the tour running

After opening the app you will see the map of Breda. When you select the icon with the three horizontal stripes, you will see a menu. When you press the button Routes, the app will navigate to a screen with the list of possible routes. 
After you have chosen one of these routes, the route between the sights will appear. If you select the menu icon while walking the tour, the menu will appear again. When you press the button Sights, you will find a list of the sights that are along the route. When you select on of these sights, you can view the detailed information, pictures and videos. It is also possible to view this information by selecting one of the markers on the map. 
As you walk, the part of the route that you have walked will have a different color. When you come within the 20 meter zone of a sight, you will receive a notification informing you that you are near a sight. When you tap on the notification, you can view the information of this sight. 
If you deviate from the tour, the app will give the directions to return to the tour.
